title: Ep. 70 - Sperm Donors
description:
On today's show, the guys sit down and have a glorious conversation about Gorman's dilemma on donating sperm to his friends and how he almost became Carson Daly before there was a Carson Daly.  They also cover a variety of other topics, including Chance the Rapper bringing back Wendy's spicy nuggets, the fall of the $5 footlong, whether or not the chicken from Los Pollos Hermanos in Breaking Bad is any good. The guys also dive into the Bubonic Plague making a triumphant return to Mongolia due to people eating massive rats, a rather large measles outbreak in Pennsylvania, booger sugar, everybody's thoughts on the Zac Efron Ted Bundy Netflix movie, Foxy's abnormal fondness for vanilla ice cream, the HBO mini-series Chernobyl, John Wick, the Starbucks Game of Thrones incident, endangered species, bed time rituals and Todd tries to catch everyone on their toes with another edition of Fact or Fiction. It's a fun one, come and have a good time with us.


This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @HeyGorman, @VivalaZito, and @evanfoxy.
dc:creator: The Pod
